ROW.DATDSC: select max(decode(mm,'01',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "01", max(decode(mm,'02',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "02", max(decode(mm,'03',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "03", max(decode(mm,'04',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "04", max(decode(mm,'05',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "05", max(decode(mm,'06',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "06", max(decode(mm,'07',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "07", max(decode(mm,'08',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "08", max(decode(mm,'09',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "09", max(decode(mm,'10',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "10", max(decode(mm,'11',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "11", max(decode(mm,'12',taxmny||'_'||sdtax,'')) "12" from ( select substr(yymm,-2) mm,sum(taxmny)/[%UNIT] taxmny,sum(sdtaxmny)/[%UNIT] sdtax from tax_taxdata where substr(yymm,0,4)=decode('[%YYYY]','',to_char(sysdate,'yyyy'),'[%YYYY]') group by substr(yymm,-2) )
